cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: FortiMail - reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in FortiGuard URI protection

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Fortinet PSIRT Contact: Email: vulnwatch@fortinet.com Website: fortiguard.com/psirt-pgpkey

DocumentNotes.Note: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability ('Cross-site Scripting') [CWE-79] in FortiMail may allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform an XSS attack via crafted HTTP GET requests to the FortiGuard URI protection service.
FortiMail version 7.0.1 and below FortiMail version 6.4.5 and below FortiMail version 6.2.7 and below
Upgrade to FortiMail version 7.0.2 or above Upgrade to FortiMail version 6.4.6 or above Upgrade to FortiMail version 6.2.8 or above
Fortinet is pleased to thank Braiant Giraldo Villa for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.
